Illidan.name: Dive
Illidan.description: Dive at the target, dealing 66 (+4% per level) damage and flipping to the other side of the target.

Illidan.name: Sweeping Strike
Illidan.description: Dash towards target point, dealing 119 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. Hitting an enemy increases your Basic Attack damage by 35% for 3 seconds.

Illidan.name: Evasion
Illidan.description: Evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2.5 seconds.

Illidan.name: The Hunt
Illidan.description: Charge to target unit, dealing 251 (+4% per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

Illidan.name: Metamorphosis
Illidan.description: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage in the area. Temporarily increases maximum Health by 200 for each Hero hit by the initial impact. Lasts for 18 seconds.

Illidan.name: Betrayer's Thirst
Illidan.description: Basic Attacks heal for 30% of damage dealt and reduce your Ability cooldowns by 1 second.

1.name: Battered Assault
1.description: Increase Sweeping Strike's Basic Attack damage bonus duration from 3 to 5 seconds. If Sweeping Strike hits 2 Heroes its damage bonus is increased from 35% to 125%.

1.name: Immolation
1.description: After using Sweeping Strike, burn nearby enemies for 22 (+4% per level) damage a second for 4 seconds.

1.name: Unending Hatred
1.description: Quest: Minion kills grant 0.2 Basic Attack Damage. Hero Takedowns grant 1 Basic Attack Damage. Reward: After gaining 20 increased Basic Attack Damage, receive an additional 20 Basic Attack Damage.

4.name: Friend or Foe
4.description: Increases the range of Dive by 20% and allows it to be used to dive to allied Heroes.

4.name: Rapid Chase
4.description: Dive grants 15% Movement Speed for 2.19 seconds.

4.name: Unbound
4.description: Sweeping Strike can go over walls and terrain. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes with Sweeping Strike, gain a second charge.

7.name: Hunter's Onslaught
7.description: Basic Abilities heal for 25% of the damage they deal. This bonus is doubled versus Heroes.

7.name: Reflexive Block
7.description: Using Dive grants 75 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

7.name: Thirsting Blade
7.description: Betrayer's Thirst's healing from Basic Attacks is increased from 30% to 50% while Sweeping Strike's damage bonus is active.

10.name: Metamorphosis
10.description: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage in the area. Temporarily increases maximum Health by 200 for each Hero hit by the initial impact. Lasts for 18 seconds.

10.name: The Hunt
10.description: Charge to target unit, dealing 251 (+4% per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

13.name: Elusive Strike
13.description: Sweeping Strike reduces the cooldown of Evasion by 3 seconds every time it damages an enemy Hero.

13.name: Nimble Defender
13.description: If Sweeping Strikes hits an enemy Hero, gain 25 Armor 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

13.name: Sixth Sense
13.description: Evasion grants Illidan 75 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell Damage, reducing their damage by 75%.

16.name: Blades of Azzinoth
16.description: Hitting 5 Heroes with Sweeping Strike allows you to activate Blades of Azzinoth to increase Basic Attack damage done by 75% for 8 seconds.

16.name: Fiery Brand
16.description: Every 4th attack against the same Hero deals an additional 6% of their maximum Health as damage.

16.name: Marked for Death
16.description: Dive deals an extra 180 damage if you hit a target consecutively within 10 seconds.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

20.name: Demonic Form
20.description: Permanently remain in Demonic Form. Metamorphosis also increases Attack Speed by 20% and reduces the duration of slows, roots, and stuns by 50%. Illidan can now mount in Demonic Form.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Nowhere to Hide
20.description: The Hunt gains unlimited range. Illidan passively reveals enemy Heroes below 25% Health anywhere on the Battleground.
